itemDescription: philanthropist and co-founder of Scottish Home Industries (bap. 1821, d. 1902)

wikipedia_page.main: Frances Sarah Beckett born Frances Sarah Bousfield became Frances Thomas (1814 – 7 September 1902) was a British philanthropist and promoter and organiser of Harris Tweed.

response: Frances Beckett (1880-1951), Irish artist,  was the paternal aunt of Nobel laureate Samuel Beckett. Her father was William Beckett and her brother William, one of four brothers, was Samuel Beckett's father.
